Text:
Just wanted to say a HUGE thanks to you mirrormaster82 - you are a comic ul legend!

You don't get the acknowledgement through grateful comments that you deserve, even though the seed and peer stats show just how many people enjoy the fruit of your labours.

I am guilty of not saying thanks to, so.. ..Thanks bud, I really do appreciate all you do :-)

P.S.  Another top quality ul by mirrormaster82! DL and SEED!
